Package Utils

Class DateTimeMethods

  • java.lang.Object
    • Utils.DateTimeMethods
  • public class DateTimeMethods
extends java.lang.Object
    This class holds all the methods related to date and time that are called by controller.

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor Description
      DateTimeMethods()  

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Static Methods Concrete Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method Description
      static boolean isOverlapping​(int AId, java.time.LocalDateTime start, java.time.LocalDateTime end)
      Checks if two LocalDateTime ranges have anything overlapping.
      static boolean isOverlappingForModify​(int customerId, java.time.LocalDateTime start, java.time.LocalDateTime end)
      Same method as above, however, must allow same exact appointment time if modifying an appointment.
      static javafx.collections.ObservableList<java.time.LocalDate> listOfFutureDates​(int days)
      This method gets the list of dates from today until the input number of days ahead, and returns as a list of LocalDates.
      static javafx.collections.ObservableList<java.time.LocalTime> listOfTimes​(int meetingInterval, int offset)
      This method gets the list of starting time for meetings as Local time objects, stored in a list, in the specified intervals (in minutes).
      static int offsetFromEST()
      This method uses the users timezone to determine to offset from EST, to determine the business hours for booking appointments.
      static java.lang.String upComingAppointmentInfo​(User user, int minutesToCheckAhead)
      This method grabs all appointments that has the users ID and compares against the current time to see if one is in fifteen minutes.

      • Methods inherited from class java.lang.Object

        clone, equals, finalize, getClass, hashCode, notify, notifyAll, toString, wait, wait, wait

      • listOfFutureDates

        public static javafx.collections.ObservableList<java.time.LocalDate> listOfFutureDates​(int days)
        This method gets the list of dates from today until the input number of days ahead, and returns as a list of LocalDates.

      • listOfTimes

        public static javafx.collections.ObservableList<java.time.LocalTime> listOfTimes​(int meetingInterval,
                                                                                 int offset)
        This method gets the list of starting time for meetings as Local time objects, stored in a list, in the specified intervals (in minutes).

      • offsetFromEST

        public static int offsetFromEST()
        This method uses the users timezone to determine to offset from EST, to determine the business hours for booking appointments.

      • isOverlapping

        public static boolean isOverlapping​(int AId,
                                    java.time.LocalDateTime start,
                                    java.time.LocalDateTime end)
        Checks if two LocalDateTime ranges have anything overlapping.

      • isOverlappingForModify

        public static boolean isOverlappingForModify​(int customerId,
                                             java.time.LocalDateTime start,
                                             java.time.LocalDateTime end)
        Same method as above, however, must allow same exact appointment time if modifying an appointment.

      • upComingAppointmentInfo

        public static java.lang.String upComingAppointmentInfo​(User user,
                                                       int minutesToCheckAhead)
        This method grabs all appointments that has the users ID and compares against the current time to see if one is in fifteen minutes.
